name: Manspreader
description:
MANSPREADER

One thing for certain is that manspreader’s are always running out of space. Help this jolly young man spread his way to victory.

HOW TO PLAY
  • Left click when a human is inside of the dotted box by the left foot.
  • Right click when a human is inside of the dotted box by the right foot.
  • Miss-spread too many times or allow people into your space and you will lose. It will be a painful loss.
TOOLS
  • Unity 2018
  • Bosca Ceoil
  • SFXR
  • GIMP
WHERE TO FIND ME

https://twitter.com/RobThomasWhite
